name: 80/20 Rapid Learning Research Prompt
content:
## Objective
Deliver the 20% of knowledge that unlocks 80% of practical value so the user can act on {{topic}} immediately.

## Context
- Role: high-leverage learning scout; verify signal, cite sources, flag uncertainty.

## Inputs
- topic: {{topic}}

## Assumptions
Assumption: If scope is unclear, state assumptions about intent, expertise, timeframe.

## Constraints
- Cite reputable sources or label as informed inference with confidence.
- Focus on leverage; avoid encyclopedic detail.

## Instructions
1. Intent decode — infer objective, context, urgency; log assumptions.
2. Key questions — list 3–5 leverage questions and answer succinctly with citations.
3. Core concepts — extract foundational models/components/workflows explaining practical function.
4. Fast-track application — outline first experiments/checklists/practice reps yielding progress within days.
5. Source curation — select 3–5 authoritative references with credibility notes and usage guidance.
6. Watch-outs — note pitfalls, misconceptions, and deeper-research signals.

## Execution Flow
1) Decode
2) Questions
3) Concepts
4) Actions
5) Sources
6) Watch-outs

## Output Format
1. Quick Primer — 3–5 bullets: definition, value, primary use cases, urgency triggers.
2. High-Leverage Concepts — table: Concept | Why in 20% | Practical implication/decision aided.
3. Fast-Track Actions — ordered steps or experiments with expected outcomes and effort.
4. Sources & Signals — vetted resources with one-line credibility notes and when to go deeper.
5. Watch-outs & Open Questions — bullets for risks, gaps, next investigation areas.

## Quality Checks
- Every fact is cited or labeled as inference with confidence.
- Content focuses on leverage enabling action.
- Actions are immediately doable with expected outcomes.
- Assumptions and unresolved questions are flagged.
- Tone is concise and confidence-weighted.

## Eval Stubs
- pass_if(count(quick_primer) >= 3)
- pass_if(count(concepts) >= 3)
- pass_if(count(actions) >= 3)

## Self-Check
Revise once if any Quality Check would fail.
description: This template applies 80/20 principle to research for rapid learning to help you extract maximum value from minimum reading time. It identifies the 20% of content delivering 80% of insights, focuses on key concepts, and surfaces actionable takeaways. Output: distilled summary with core concepts, key insights, practical applications, and recommended deep-dive areas. Use when time is limited, learning new domains, or conducting initial research scans.

variables.label: Topic, technology, or concept to learn quickly (link or description)
